lead_paragraph: Running back Deuce McAllister was released by the New Orleans Saints, the only N.F.L. team he has played for. McAllister, the Saints’ career rushing leader with 6,069 yards, was due more than $7 million next season — part of an eight-year contract for more than $50 million that he signed in 2005, before the first of his two reconstructive knee operations. McAllister played a limited role last season with 107 carries for 418 yards.
